name: Malware Fighter 2D
description:
Malware fighter 2d is a game where you control a firewall by pressing 'a' or 'd'.

You have to hit the malware (red) coming down or it will damage your system health.

You also get points for hitting (red) malware.

If you miss a piece of ransomware (yellow) you will be unable to move your firewall for a few seconds.

If you miss a piece of spyware (blue) it will damage your system health slowly over time.

If you miss a piece of adware (green) a "ad" will appear to block your vision.

When your system health reaches 0% you lose.
